body_html: I'm just saying that on the platform we saw, ptrdiff_t was unsigned long. We are not sure why. But that's the reason for the segfault and the incorrect behavior of rest of pytorch under PPC64 in what we tested.
body_text: I'm just saying that on the platform we saw, ptrdiff_t was unsigned long. We are not sure why. But that's the reason for the segfault and the incorrect behavior of rest of pytorch under PPC64 in what we tested.
body: I'm just saying that on the platform we saw, ptrdiff_t was unsigned long. We are not sure why. But that's the reason for the segfault and the incorrect behavior of rest of pytorch under PPC64 in what we tested.
